articles.title: Watch: Mayank cops a nasty blow in the ribs by vicious bouncer from Umran Malik - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Despite the pain, Mayank opted to continue, but fell a couple of deliveries later, hence continuing his poor run of form in IPL 2022.
